articles.title: Joe Joyce reveals he told Daniel Dubois to follow the 'Mike Tyson route and turn professional' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Joyce and Dubois have rubbed shoulders for several years, ever since a teenage Dubois joined his rival on the Great Britain setup, and Joyce gave the youngster some career advice four years ago.
articles.content: Joe Joyce has revealed how Daniel Dubois once sought his advice on whether he should follow in Mike Tyson's footsteps - and on Saturday the two heavyweights collide on the same night that the 'Baddes… [+3065 chars]

articles.author: Callum Vurley
articles.title: Premier League outline strict rules for fans' return including no drinking alcohol - Mirror Online
articles.description: Football fans will be allowed in some grounds next month when lockdown is over after the Prime Minister Boris Johnson outlined a plan for sporting events to resume after December 2
articles.content:
The Premier League is set to install a strict set of rules upon the return of fans next month, including banning drinking alcohol and keeping food kiosks within grounds closed.
It follows the Prime … [+2126 chars]
